title: Game failure on co-op vs AI
body:
Two games in a row where I've connected to a Co-op vs AI game then had the game client not load so the server thinks I've left. Currently typing this with the League loading logo sitting over my screen because the game won't actually load but the login client has closed.
Attempts to reconnect give me a message saying my firewall may be blocking the game and/or the game has crashed. This is strange, as the game worked yesterday and I don't think my firewall has updated since then.

What the heck is going on?{{item:3070}}

Seriously I'm going to end up with three leaves by my name and it's entirely because the game client is being a pos.

replies.body: Could you try running League with your firewall completely disabled?
